lead_paragraph: A handwritten letter dated May 29, 1962, by Adolf Eichmann to the president of Israel asking for a pardon and commutation of his death sentence for war crimes was released to the public for the first time on Wednesday.

headline.main: Adolf Eichmann’s 1962 Letter to President Yitzhak Ben-Zvi of Israel

snippet: A handwritten letter dated May 29, 1962, by Adolf Eichmann to the president of Israel asking for a pardon and commutation of his death sentence for war crimes was released to the public for the first time on Wednesday.
